mapper.insert: insert into cart(userId, productId, price, amount, total) values (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{total})
mapper.select: select * from cart join product p on cart.productId = p.id where userid=#{userId} order by createdAt desc
mapper.update: update cart set amount=#{amount}, total=#{total} where userid=#{userId} and productid=#{productId}
